response.body: <s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <s:Body> <s:Fault> <faultcode>s:Client</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="en-US">The creator of this fault did not specify a Reason.</faultstring> <detail> <ExpectedFaultDetail xmlns="http://www.gamestop.com/services/core/contracts/faults/2011/04" xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FaultCode>401.Membership.001</FaultCode> <Message>Membership Already Exists.</Message> </ExpectedFaultDetail> </detail> </s:Fault> </s:Body> </s:Envelope>
